titles.title: Depository Institution Customer Protection Act
To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act and the Federal Credit Union Act to prohibit fees for using teller windows at depository institutions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services

bill.summary: 10/12/1998--Introduced. Depository Institution Customer Protection Act - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act and the Federal Credit Union Act to prohibit the imposition of any fee on an institution's customer for using its teller windows at a domestic branch.
